name: Alvin MINOR, Appellant v. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
